title: The Weighing Of The Heart
provenance: 2000, purchased by donor from Kennedy Galleries, New York, NY, at time of the Kennedy Galleries exhibition, Keven Coates: Jewel Works / Fragments: Pages Stolen From A Book Of Time.
medium: Mixed media on slate, painted wood, Plexiglass
description: Gray rectangular box with Plexiglass front panel that slides up to allow access to decorated slate panel with mount for brooch.
name: Art-form holder for brooch
